titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize accelerated payments for short-term, high-cost courses taken by veterans pursuing post secondary education, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E657)
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education, Training and Employment.

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Authorizes accelerated payments for short-term, high-cost courses taken by veterans pursuing post-secondary education, subject to specified requirements.
